body_html:
I find that:
when I set conv2d kernel size with [2,EMBEDDING_SIZE,1,64] or [1,EMBEDDING_SIZE,1,64],it is very slow(113.2 examples/sec).
But when I set kernel size with [3,EMBEDDING_SIZE,1,64] ,it's 11502.3 examples/sec,100 times faster.

All padding with VALID.

body:
I find that:
when I set conv2d kernel size with [2,EMBEDDING_SIZE,1,64] or [1,EMBEDDING_SIZE,1,64],it is very slow(113.2 examples/sec).
But when I set kernel size with [3,EMBEDDING_SIZE,1,64] ,it's 11502.3 examples/sec,100 times faster.

All padding with VALID.
